actions.committee: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

official_title: A bill to provide that Members of Congress shall not receive a cost of living adjustment in pay during 2013.
short_title: No Pay Raise for Congress Act of 2012
subjects: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

summary.text: No Pay Raise for Congress Act of 2012 - Eliminates automatic cost of living (COLA) adjustments for Members of Congress during FY2013.

titles.title: No Pay Raise for Congress Act of 2012
A bill to provide that Members of Congress shall not receive a cost of living adjustment in pay during 2013.
